suggest.ext-xhprof: You need to install either xhprof or uprofiler.
suggest.ext-uprofiler: You need to install either xhprof or uprofiler.
suggest.ext-mongodb: Mongo is needed to store profiler results.
suggest.ext-sqlite3: sqlite3 is needed to store profiler results.
suggest.ext-pdo_mysql: pdo_mysql is needed to store profiler results.
